name: retrieve_specific_queue_time
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool unofficial_efteling_api.
Tool description: An Unofficial Efteling API is a software tool that allows developers to access real-time queue times and news from the Efteling amusement park, located in the Netherlands. The API provides a simple and easy-to-use interface for retrieving data, which can be integrated into third-party applications, websites, or services. With this API, users can stay up-to-date with the latest information on ride wait times and park news, making it easier to plan their visit to the park. This API is not offic...
API description: retrieve a specific queue item based on the ID that can be retrieved from the /queue endpoint

is_id.description: The ID of the specific queue item to retrieve.
